rows.label: tlk006101_06_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, listen to this!
Garram-san is going to give us
salvage training soon!

rows.label: tlk006101_06_msg0002
rows.name:
...But it seems Pittman-san
will be there too.

rows.label: tlk006101_06_msg0003
rows.name:
There's the matter of me stealing his ship,
and he always looks at us so sternly...

rows.label: tlk006101_06_msg0004
rows.name:
I know it's all my own fault,
but I'm still not good with that guy...
